  • Method Details

    • getTopSuggestions

      public SuggestionsSummary getTopSuggestions(SuggestionContext context)
      Description copied from interface: SuggestionService
      The top suggestions from all data source. The front-end will use these, and a count to provide the below two examples (a,b,c are selected based on them being exact matches, and then using the top 3 by 'popularity'.) 
           a
     b
     c
     + 6 more results

      or 

           a
     b
     c
     d
      Specified by:
      getTopSuggestions in interface SuggestionService
      Parameters:
      context - the context including the term we are searching for, the master book selected, etc.

    • getFirstNSuggestions

      public SuggestionsSummary getFirstNSuggestions(SuggestionContext context)
      Description copied from interface: SuggestionService
      Returns the first set of results that are available to the user
      Specified by:
      getFirstNSuggestions in interface SuggestionService
      Parameters:
      context - the context object in which all suggestion request information is stored (input, search type, etc.)
